/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on SC for disabilities associated with service in the RVN, including
SC for NHL under 38 CFR 3.313 based on service in the RVN during the Vietnam era
, and
subcategories of NHL qualifying for presumptive SC
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Ratings for Disabilities Associated with Herbicide Exposure
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
